General.Name: Zhengzhou Coal Industry & Electric Power Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhengzhou Coal Industry & Electric Power Co., Ltd. produces and sells coal in China. The company offers lean coal and anthracite for use in for power generation. It is also involved in trade of coal-related materials and equipment, logistics, transportation, communication, and construction businesses. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Zhengzhou, China.

3.Name: Ms. Xiao Yan  Chen
3.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
